main event: An observer at Dayton Airport reported seeing a very cigar-cloud like object approximately 6 to 8 ft in diameter on April 4, 1958.
interesting points: The object was observed to travel at about 50 miles per hour and was very low to the ground, only a few feet above it., The observer stated the object was surrounded by a mist or cloud., The sighting lasted for approximately 60-90 seconds., There was no noise or exhaust emissions from the object., Additional comments suggested the object could be a cloud, aircraft, balloon, or natural phenomenon.
sighted object: very cigar-cloud like object, 6 to 8 ft in diameter
witness description: The observer provided descriptions based on their visual observation.
